text: The men's 4x100 metres relay event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 19 and 20 September. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Allyn Condon Darren Campbell Jamie Baulch Jason Fergus ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| George Page Milton Mallard Tony McCall Curtis Johnson ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Tony Ogbeta Deji Aliu Uche Olisa Paul Egonye ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 September {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
